promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong lynx steel-type pokemon wearing a ornate crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystyx, a a chibi cute strong lynx steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Iron Smash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "steel" or "Crystyx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lynx-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This adorably fierce feline, a desert dweller, boasts an unbreakable crystalline coat and excels in its signature move, Metallic Pounce.
